ygData.subject: Re: Bronze armor
ygData.msgSnippet: No you cannot smith bronze, Hopefully we will be able to make field plate SOON =P As for the second book, you can get them both at Kelethin ... From: Nick To:
ygData.messageBody:
No you cannot smith bronze, Hopefully we will be able to make field plate SOON =P
As for the second book, you can get them both at Kelethin
----- Original Message -----
From: Nick
To: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com
Sent: Saturday, July 24, 1999 11:19 PM
Subject: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Bronze armor


Is it possible to smith bronze armor? I don't think it is possible, but I thought I would ask just in case. Also where in the faydwer area can I get the second smithing book. I only have the first.
Thank you
